{"id":450112063,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 4 months","timestamp":1612093210,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"20 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/450112063/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse String","memory":"24.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int n;\n    void rev(vector<char>& s,int x){\n        if(x>((n-1)/2)) return;\n        rev(s,x+1);\n        swap(s[x],s[n-x-1]);\n    }\n    void reverseString(vector<char>& s) {\n        if(s.size()==0) return;\n        n=s.size();\n        rev(s,0);\n        return;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-string"}
